question: The area of psychology concerned with the study and enhancement of positive feelings, traits, and abilities is:

a.rationale: Either the theory or the treatment of abnormal psychological functioning that emphasizes unconscious psychological forces as the cause of psychopathology. (Theories/Models in abnormal psychology)

b.rationale: The humanistic therapy developed by Fritz Perls in which clinicians actively move individuals toward selfrecognition and self-acceptance by using techniques such as role-playing and skillful frustration. (Theories/Models in abnormal psychology)

c.rationale: The study and enhancement of positive feelings, traits, and abilities. (Theories/Models of abnormal psychology)

d.rationale: Humanistic psychology: The theoretical perspective that human beings are born with a natural inclination to be friendly, cooperative, and constructive and are driven to self-actualize. (Theories/Models in abnormal psychology)
